story:
Look who is writing articles about Selena The One and her "Hologram-ish" new virtual beginning.


Fortune Magazine Post May 29th

  The Washington Post ArticleRolling Stone Article

ET online article


People Magazine article

USA Today Video

Billboard Magazine article

CNN article

E Online article

NBC News article

Time Magazine article



We would like to thank the publishers of the mentioned articles.

May 15th Through The 19th Final Discounted Prices  For Selena Fans!!!!!!


Summary


Acrovirt is creating Selena The One digital beginning, as  a walking, talking, singing, dancing and thinking iconic singer, Selena Quintanilla. This technology while not exactly a hologram has been called hologram-ish. This technology constructs Selena's  body, voice and her mind. We accomplish this by building supercomputers of her most important past features, her body and in it's unique motion, her fantastically expressive singing and speaking voice, and most importantly we capture critical elements of her mind.  Selena will appear on tour as a HD image on large screens in selected cities in North America, South America and Europe.
      
“In the past we have had technologies, which were and are imperfect and delivered on only small portions of what we believe is possible for these new virtual beginning opportunities. Now with the advances in technology we are able to create a digital presence that is so remarkable that it allows us to experience physically and mentally the true new virtual beginning and future of that person “ – Michael Caldwell

Acrovirt is working with Selena’s immediate family and cutting-edge scientists for the creation of Selena's digital acrovirt. Acrovirt, LLC has a master research and development agreement with the University of California, San Diego to develop virtualization and interactive technologies for educational, therapeutic and entertainment purposes. Selena The One will release new songs and new music videos. She will collaborate with current hit artists and aims to go on tour in 2018.


History


Terry Kennedy and Michael Caldwell started Acrovirt, LLC in 2013. Terry Kennedy’s background has been in the entertainment industry as executive producer for dozens of TV shows and movies. Co- Founder J. Michael Caldwell has an extensive history in developing technology Companies and numerous patents in numerous industries in 2014 Acrovirt, LLC entered into a master research and development partnership with the  University of California, San Diego. In September of 2014 Acrovirt, LLC, Q-Productions and the Quintanilla family entered into a partnership to develop and create Selena The One.



Acrovirt's Technology


The company uses its technology to capture and correlate the individual's extensive biological and/or historical information for conversion into the digital world building the individual acrovirt's predictive mind, brain, body and voice. The individual’s acrovirt will autonomously learn, act and react as its human donor would. Selena’s acrovirt will interact in various forms in music, media-entertainment, film, TV and online-file sharing opportunities. 



The Reason


Selena is the perfect artist to become the world's first digital acrovirt. She is an icon of passion and talent that caused the world to see (the value of art in the Latino American community) and she brought Latino music to the masses with her talents. This Selena The One campaign is important because it allows our revolutionary technology to come to the marketplace through the best possible icon/artist and funding process we can imagine. Acrovirt believes that crowdfunding is the newest pathway for new technology companies' products to go to the marketplace.  This is an opportunity for Selena's fans to have direct involvement .



It is also the intention of the company to offer and sell securities, for the first time ever under the Securities and Exchange Commission’s new rule change to enable smaller companies to offer and sell equity. These new SEC regulations come into effect in late summer, early fall of 2015 and Selena The One would like to be the first to offer these opportunities. In compliance with all SEC regulations, this new development allows the fans of Selena to buy outright into their favorite artist digital acrovirt.




Please Support Selena The One


We want to ask you to support our Indiegogo campaign to create Selena's digital acrovirt. With Selena's digital acrovirt you will be able to hear her sing, see her perform and experience her as though she is with you. Your financial support makes this all possible. Viva Selena!




What We Need & What You Get


Selena The One will be using the campaign revenue to further the creation of Selena's acrovirt. She will be singing new songs, and performing in music videos. The revenue will  also be used for the start up cost of the Selena The One Live and Digital Essence tours.

 We will be using the most advanced technology, the best programmers, engineers in the world and we are collaborating with the best neuroscience individuals.We are also collaborating with the best cognitive science university researchers in the world. We believe we have partnered with the people who knew Selena best, her family, and now we need one other partner and that’s you.


We are offering something for everyone.

  • You can be the first to receive a digital download of Selena’s acrovirt singing songs "No Llores Mas Corazon", "Como Te Quiero A Ti" and an "Untitled" not previously recorded song in English , one week before the songs are released to the general public,
  • You will be given a free membership to the Selena The One website, where you can participate in the fan forum, follow the progress with weekly updates and schedules, and give your helpful input or helpful opinions to the management of Selena The One .You can have an impact on your queen's acrovirt.
  • Receive a digital download of the music videos for "No Llores Mas Corazon", "Como Te Quiero A Ti" and a  song in English not previously recorded, one week before the videos are released to the general public,
  • Receive an autographed collector's copy of all three songs signed by one of the Quintanilla family members or one of the founders of Selena The One. To be delivered one week before the song's are released to the general public,



  • Receive a signed collectable copy of all 3 music videos featuring Selena's acrovirt singing, dancing and performing. Delivered one week before the videos are released to the general public,
  • Sing in the background on one or all three songs by uploading your voice to us within the parameters we set, and receive a certificate confirming participation. Delivered one week before the songs are released to the general public,
  • Upload a video of your complete body with our direction and be made virtual to be included in all three videos,
  • Purchase a ticket for a general admission or VIP ticket to the Selena The One Live or Digital Essence Tour in 2018 .
  • Pay per view/Video on Demand of live broadcast of the Selena The One Live & Digital Essence Tour.



If for any reason we do not hit our campaign financial goal we will still release Selena The One through other production and distribution outlets. This will involve extended time period before we would release to you. The money raised in this campaign would be used to continue development and production of Selena The One's acrovirt.


The Impact

We believe Selena will be the perfect artist for the world's first acrovirt. She is an icon of passion and talent that caused the world to experience her art in the Latino American community and brought Latino music to the masses. We are bringing together Selena and her fans to participate with the artist's acrovirt. 



Representation

We have filed four patents for this groundbreaking technology with Sheppard & Mullin, a nationally recognized patent, corporate, and entertainment law firm. We believe that with the state of technology in the world today everything we are doing is achievable. Sheppard Mullin San Diego Offices


    Other Ways You Can Help


    We know that not everyone has the financial ability to contribute to our campaign. We would like to ask you to share our campaign website www.selenatheone.com and our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/selenatheone,  with your friends and family. There are also an Indiegogo "share tools" that we would love you to use. Thank you for your support. Viva Selena!

    Press and Interview contact:

    press@selenatheone.com  or selenatheonemedia@gmail.com

to receive a digital download of Selena’s acrovirt singing songs "No Llores Mas Corazon", "Como Te Quiero A Ti" and an "Untitled" not previously recorded song in English ,
one week before the songs are released to the general public, 

You will be given a free membership to the Selena The One website, where
 you can participate in the fan forum, follow the progress with weekly 
updates and schedules, and give your helpful input or helpful opinions 
to the management of Selena The One .You can have an impact on your queen's acrovirt.

Receive a digital download of the music
videos for "No Llores Mas Corazon", "Como Te Quiero A Ti" and a  song in English not previously recorded, one week
before the videos are released to the general public,
Receive an autographed collector's copy
of all three songs signed by one of the Quintanilla family members or one of the founders of Selena The One. To be delivered one
week before the song's are released to the general public,




Receive a signed collectable copy of
all 3 music videos featuring Selena's acrovirt singing, dancing and performing. Delivered one
week before the videos are released to the general public,
Sing in the background on one or all three
songs by uploading your voice to us within the parameters we set, and receive a certificate confirming participation. Delivered one week before the songs are released to the general
public,
Upload a video of your complete body
with our direction and be made virtual to be included in all three videos,
Purchase a ticket for a general admission or VIP ticket to the Selena The One Live or Digital Essence Tour in 2018 .

Pay per view/Video on Demand of live broadcast of the Selena The One Live & Digital Essence Tour.


If for any reason we do not hit our campaign financial goal we will still release Selena The One through other production and distribution outlets. This will involve extended time period before we would release to you. The money raised in this campaign would be used to continue development and production of Selena The One's acrovirt.    The Impact We believe Selena will be the perfect artist for the world's first acrovirt. She is an icon of passion and talent that
caused the world to experience her art in the Latino American community and
brought Latino music to the masses. We are bringing together Selena and her fans to participate with the artist's acrovirt. 

 
  Representation
 We have filed four patents for this groundbreaking technology with Sheppard & Mullin, a nationally recognized patent, corporate, and entertainment law firm. We believe that with the state of technology in the world today everything we are doing is achievable. Sheppard Mullin San Diego Offices
   Other Ways You Can Help 
We know that not everyone has the financial ability to contribute to our campaign. We would like to ask you to share our campaign website www.selenatheone.com and our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/selenatheone,  with your friends and family. There are also an Indiegogo "share tools" that we would love you to use. Thank you for your support. Viva Selena!
Press and Interview contact:

press@selenatheone.com  or selenatheonemedia@gmail.com

story:
5000 people. One record breaking event.

The World's Largest Pillow Fight 2015.

ScratchOut Creations would like to host an event on Virginia Beach to break the world Record for the largest pillow fight. 


Along with the main event we will have smaller pillow fights to compete in for prizes, vendor stands to purchase food and beverages, a small outside dining area to eat and watch it all happen, and even a stage with a live band!


Help us reach our goal for this exciting event! We want to launch into this new year with something truly spectacular.


With your help, we can raise the fund required to make this event happen.  From banners and t-shirts to a website and various other forms of promotion, our funding goal will insure we have what we need to make this a reality. Please remember we've poured our money, time, and soul into this!


Be sure to follow all of our video updates for more info on what's going on now!


Want to be more involved? Donate! Our rewards will surely make you stand out in a crowd of 5,000 angry pillow fighters!

story:
Testimonial

My name is Brenda Cline and I have worked in the Nashville music industry for over twenty-five years. I have devoted my career to discovering, developing, and managing talent. Working in the music business you are constantly approached by talented artists with big dreams and stars in their eyes. However, it takes more than talent to make it in this highly competitive, oversaturated, marketplace.  But every now and then you meet an exceptional artist who has everything it takes to become a big star.  I believe that sixteen year old country singer/songwriter Maddie Logan is that artist. I can say with complete confidence that she is a star soon to be discovered. As we say in the music business she is the “complete package” and could be the next big thing!

Not only is Maddie extremely talented as a singer and songwriter, but she  possesses a relentless drive and commitment.  I’ve personally never met an artist even close to her age that works as hard and is as committed as she is. Maybe that's because she has been in the entertainment business since age three.  There is only one thing lacking in order to take Maddie Logan's career to the next level, and that is funding. 

The music business has changed dramatically over the years and record labels expect a certain amount of artist development to be done before they will take a meeting.  Artists must have a quality recording that has already created a buzz and to have fan awareness through social media marketing. In addition, artists need marketing materials, EPK's, and videos. Record labels also expect you to have achieved CD and merchandise sales from promotion and touring. Again, it all takes a great deal of money.

Maddie has already accomplished so much on her own but now needs your support.  With your partnership she can record a stellar album from the songs that she has already written, sell her CD, then reinvest those sales back into her career to get to the next level. Maddie picked up a guitar at age eight, started writing music, and hasn't stopped since. She deserves the chance because she is the real deal. We all know there are no guarantees, but, if anyone can do it Maddie Logan can.  Please join our team and contribute any amount you and  can, or if you  can't contribute please share with your friends!

We thank you!

Brenda Cline

What We Need It For

The funds will be used for Maddie's debut studio recording in Nashville, Tennessee, designing and manufacturing of CDs, design and manufacturing of merchandise, and the design and manufacturing of marketing and promotional materials.

 Budget:

Studio Production  $20,000

(producer, engineer, studio, musicians, mixing, mastering)

CD Artwork/Graphic design    $1500.00

CD Manufacturing    $3,500.00

Graphic Design for Merchandise     $500.00

Merchandise Manufacturing     $2,500.00

Graphic Design for Marketing Materials     $250.00

Marketing/Promotional  Materials Manufacturing     $1,750.00

TOTAL     $30,000.00

What You Get:

We have some awesome perks for you listed on the right.  Also, check out the shirts and wristband we designed for this campaign!!

Impact

Hey y'all I'm Maddie Logan. Two years ago I moved from California to Tennessee to pursue a career as a Country music singer-songwriter.  Some people may not think that at 16 a teen would know what they want to do with the rest of their life.  But for me there has never been any doubt. I picked up a guitar at age 8, started writing songs and  haven't stopped since.  As many of you probably know, expectations for new artists in today's music industry are staggering, and the costs are monumental! But with the songs that I have written and a lot of really hard work, I know I can record an album that music fans are going to love and record labels can't ignore! Please help me get one step closer to fulfilling my dream and getting my music out there to all of you!!

Thank you so much!

XOXO,

Maddie

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate you can help by being on our team and sharing this campaign with everyone you know! The more people that know about this campaign, the better! Please share the link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, any other social media platform, email or old fashioned word of mouth. 

 Thank you, thank you, thank you! YOU ARE SO AWESOME!

Team

Maddie Logan, Brenda Cline, Mike Goncalves, Connor Logan, Michael Logan and Kristi Logan.

story:
Pastor Sim Q.|Quality Music Group


Greeting Family,


We at Pastor Sim Q|Quality Music Group humbly invites you to participate in the, "Love Music Giveaway"! We at Quality Music Group are firm believers of community activism, community upliftment and community wellness especially through the facets of music. We believe that our music along with countless other artist's music have the power to heal and at times creates a productive outlet to those waring with addictions of every kind. So Pastor Sim Q.|Quality Music Group, Houston's own, "Beanz N Kornbread" and ZG Productions LLC. have all teamed up together in love to provide free mp3 players/ipods and empowerment training to brothers & sisters dealing with addiction from various treatment centers in multiple major cities during the release of Pastor Sim Q's new singles of empowerment & healing, "Open Your Heart" & "Refuse To Lose"! We ask that you donate used/new ipods or a donation for the purchase of an MP3 player to our worthy cause of empowerment & hope through music that heals! Below is a little information on our CEO/Founder:

Pastor Sim Q.  also known too many as the Honorable Rev. Dr. Simeon L. Queen is truly a peculiar 35 yr. old who has focused his life’s work on that of building the kingdom of God as well as creating facets of holistic community development to build our sustainable communities. Dr. Queen was blessed to have received a Bachelor of Science in Criminal Justice, with a specialization in Juvenile Justice Systems, a Master of Arts in Counseling, & a Master of Community Development with certifications in Community Planning & Fundraising all before the age of 24 from Prairie View A&M University. In June of 2006, Rev. Queen received his Doctorate of Missionology from The Lord’s Outreach School of Theology in Lake Charles. Dr. Queen’s political career began at 21 when he ran as a Write-In candidate for Waller County Justice of the Peace, Pct.3 & continued with him running for Waller County Commissioner, Pct. 3, in which he successfully won the Primary, but took an unexpected lost in the general election. Understanding that with no struggle there is no progress, Dr. Queen refused to quit and was a Honorable City Councilman, Position #5, for the great city of Prairie View, Texas, where he also was the Chairman of the Board of Adjustments & Appeals for their historical city. He was elected in May 2006 within the State of Texas. He has also served as the past Mayor Pro Tem and has currently completed his 4th term (8yrs) in elected office & 3yrs appointed  office.  He is currently taking a well needed rest from politics.  Dr. Queen is also a author of a ground breaking book deemed, “Christians We Be Clubbin”, a book to bring forth a new consciousness in spiritual enlightenment to the younger generation and the body of Christ in general. Dr. Queen released his 1st single in 2012 titled, “The Amazing”, the first of a song & sermon series. Dr. Queen is currently the CEO/Founder of Quality Music Group, the Past National Executive Vice President for F.O.C.G: Sigma Rhomeo Inc., a past Chaplin for the Epsilon Tau Lambda Chapter of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity Inc., the Past National Chaplain (3 terms) for the Prairie View A&M University National Alumni Association, active member of Lonestar #85 of District 15a of the MWPHGLOTX, Board Member: PFAW/AAMLC, Co-Founder of Micah Leadership Council:AARA/PFAW, Past Texas State Director:Young Elected Officials Network, Founder: National Black Caucus of the Young Elected Officials Network,  the Founder of God’s Elite Ministries, Inc & the Co-Founder of the PVAMU International Alumni Foundation. Rev. Dr. Queen also serves a Pastor of Community Affairs & Homelessness Services for the world renowned St. John’s Downtown & Northwest UMC/Bread of Life, Inc./Temenos CDC, where he helps to lead the war for spiritual enlightenment and the battles of Hunger, Homelessness, & HIV.


The Goal

* Empower 21 Treatment Centers

* 1000 MP3/iPods: New or Used Distributed

* Empowerment Training for those warring with addictions.....

* Powerful Testimonials 

* Live Music Workshops

* Free Music Downloads for those in treatment....

* Create a mindset of healing and love through the healing properties of music....

* Interactive Love Sessions


Our financial goal for this project is 12,000 dollars usd........



Levels of Giving:


Lover: One who loves (General Contributer)  | $15

Bronze Lover: $30

Sliver Lover: $50

Gold Lover: $100

Platinum Lover: $500

Diamond Lover: $1000 or more

*Please feel at liberty to give what ever God puts on your heart, no matter what the donation size*


Thank You so much for giving & supporting music that heals!!!!!!!

Our financial goal for this project is 12,000 dollars usd........

Lover: One who loves (General Contributer)  | $15
Bronze Lover: $30
Sliver Lover: $50
Gold Lover: $100
Platinum Lover: $500
Diamond Lover: $1000 or more
*Please feel at liberty to give what ever God puts on your heart, no matter what the donation size*

Thank You so much for giving & supporting music that heals!!!!!!!

story:
My name is Joey Sabina. I am an accordionist, pianist, vocalist and otherwise multi-instrumentalist. I have started this campaign in an attempt to raise funds for a professional quality instrument modeled FR8XB made by the Roland company. This instrument will allow me greater musical capabilities with the state of the art technologies it possesses. It will enhance my live performances by eliminating the feedback and volume dips and swells that come with acoustic instruments that are amplified through microphone systems.


My campaign is to raise $7000.00 for this purchase. This amount may seem steep but it is the price of the instrument without a protective case or the shipping costs which I will be covering on my own. If I am unable to reach my goal for the instrument I will be using the funds to seek out a used unit of an older model. There are few of them in the country which will make it slightly difficult but not impossible. By helping me you will be able to hear the advancement of my musical abilities through the YouTube channel I will be starting to showcase my classical music studies as well as the continued journey of my band Malvador.

Without the help of this campaign this instrument will be beyond my financial abilities. I live for music and devote many hours to writing, analyzing, studying and enjoying it. In my 30 years I have had experience with over 20 different instruments. However, finding the accordion has led me down a road of musical devotion I had never previously experienced.


I am asking for your help to attain my goals not just monetarily but musically. To succeed in music is my one true dream in life.  I ask that if you are not able to help financially than to please share this campaign with others.  Spread the word of a struggling musician and his dream to revitalize the accordion in the modern music world.

story:
! FÜR ALLE, DIE KEIN PAYPAL HABEN : Ihr könnt manuell

unterstützen unter  Crowdfunding on MANOUZ.DE

Worum geht es in diesem Projekt?

Mir geht es darum, mein lang ersehntes, erstes Album auf die Beine zu stellen
und zu veröffentlichen. Da ich mich dazu entschieden habe, alles mit einem
eigenen kleinen Team selbst in die Hand zu nehmen, brauche ich Eure Unterstützung um die Produktion des Albums zu finanzieren.
Ich lade Euch ein, Teil von diesem spannenden Projekt zu werden !

Was sind die Ziele und wer die Zielgruppe?

Ziel ist es, nachdem ich in den vergangenen Jahren zusammen mit verschiedenen
Künstlern auf Bühnen in ganz Deutschland und Europa gestanden habe,
endlich meinem eigenen Klangkosmos, meinen Songs Raum und Aufmerksamkeit zu geben und diese in einem Album zu verewigen.
Viele meiner supporter warten schon lange darauf, meine Musik auf CD zu haben
und sich ins Regal stellen zu können.
Ich habe in den letzten Jahren viele Erfahrungen beim Produzieren und Songwriting
gesammelt, nicht zuletzt innerhalb der Felix Meyer Band und der Produktion unserer vier Studioalben.
Jetzt ist Zeit für Eigenes !
Es gibt schon ein paar Vorproduktionen zuhause in meinem kleinen Home-Studio und ich kann Euch sagen - es wird wunderbar !

Warum sollte jemand dieses Projekt unterstützen?

Handgemachte Musik und ehrliche Texte werden immer seltener.
Heutzutage kannst Du als Künstler mit einem Netzwerk von fähigen Leuten um Dich rum und einer community, die ein Projekt unterstützenswert findet und etwas in den magischen Hut schmeißt, einiges erreichen.
Ich habe in den vergangenen Jahren gemerkt, dass meine Musik bei vielen von Euch
großen Anklang findet.
Dafür möchte ich mich mit meinem Album bedanken.

Was passiert mit dem Geld bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung?

Das Geld ermöglicht mir, die Aufnahmen für das Album fertigzustellen,
die Musiker Grafiker etc. gebührend zu bezahlen, die Songs mixen und           mastern zu lassen.

Außerdem werde ich mit Eurer Hilfe die Kosten für die                                        Herstellung der CD decken.

Wer steht hinter dem Projekt?

In erster Linie Erik Manouz,
mein Netzwerk aus kreativen Freunden, die mich bei der Realisierung
dieses Projektes unterstützen und natürlich meine Band.
Ich hoffe natürlich, dass auch ihr Teil von diesem Projekt werdet !
Los gehts !!! :)

In erster Linie Erik Manouz,mein Netzwerk aus kreativen Freunden, die mich bei der Realisierungdieses Projektes unterstützen und natürlich meine Band.Ich hoffe natürlich, dass auch ihr Teil von diesem Projekt werdet !Los gehts !!! :)

story:
I am J'DA PRYNCE- an intrepid, independent artist and musical innovator. My vocal styles have been compared to the king of soul, Al Green, and my stage energy to that of the father of funk, James Brown. Known for my impeccable style and electrifying charisma on stage, 

I have been entertaining audiences with my own brand of music, reviving late era soul across the U.S.and abroad for more than a decade now. Today, I am captivating international audiences at venues from Singapore to Bangkok, as a part of a three-year booking contract with EL-Live Productions. 

While overseas, I have also been hard at work on new music for my second studio album, Heart vs. Head, which I plan to release in the Summer of 2015. 

Many of my fans describe me as a self-assured entertainer, but this was certainly not always the case.  Remarkably, having the opportunity to travel abroad and work overseas, I have come to find self-love and acceptance of who I am.  I am now able to look inward, examine my past and present state and make conscious choices regarding my future, and my role in the world in which we live.   Most importantly, I have learned that we can all co-exist and live happy together. It does not matter if one is Asian, Black, White, straight, gay, transgender, spiritual, religious, educated, "under-educated", rich or poor, we each share similarities and differences. And, we are each responsible for our own happiness!

From mainstream music to social media, the world is filled with so much hatred and violence today. It seems many people have forgotten how to love themselves and, as a direct result, they do not know how to express love for others. 

I want to share where I am currently in my life's journey with our global community through my new CD project. Heart vs. Head, my second full length album, is a uniquely honest and vulnerable musical portrait that deals with the internal battles we often face on a day to day basis.  The messages that I hope to get across in this album are very dear to me and I think are important to the rest of the world. 

Sometimes I struggle with self-acceptance and self-love. I believe it is important to let people know that only once we love and accept ourselves can we truly love and accept someone else.

My new album, Heart vs. Head will uplift spirits, heal past wounds and help others to find self-love and acceptance and ultimately love for humankind. 

In 2015, I want to take my new music, filled with messages of hope, inspiring lyrics and trance-like dance rhythms to audiences across the world. 

WHAT J'DA PRYNCE NEEDS: I am creating my second album, Heart vs. Head, and planning tour dates for the Fall 2015. Join me in raising $100,000 towards: 

  • Studio Recording 
  • Mixing and Mastering  
  • Photography and Videography
  • Graphic Design
  • Promotions 
  • Distribution
  • Travel  
  • Tour 
  • Merchandising
  • Any money raised beyond the goal will be put towards marketing

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP: If you are unable to donate money, but you want to help, please do so by spreading the word to people who may be interested in funding this project. Share our campaign information on your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc). Also, come out to a future J'DA Prynce concert. And, we are always looking for a few good people to join Team J'Da Prynce! 

GIVING BACK TO THE COMMUNITY: In addition, J’Da Prynce has pledged to donate 10% of all monies raised from the Heart vs. Head campaign to the CHRIS KIDS Foundation (www.chriskids.org), which empowers children, youth and families in Atlanta to be self-sufficient contributing members of the community and reach their full potential.

Visit www.jdaprynce.com or www.facebook.com/jdaworld to learn more about J'Da Prynce, his forthcoming album (Heart vs. Head) as well as J'Da Prynce tour dates in 2015.

story:
3rd Studio Album - Song Inspiration

I released my debut album NO LIES in 2006 and latest release in 2012 - WOMAN OF RED.  Four years later (2016) I begin the next creation in the next stage of my life. 

After a life-saving opportunity of love and freedom came my way in January 2014 AND after I was ready to face myself, everything that was would beautifully change forever.  I needed to find the courage to walk away from everything as I knew it to step into this battle with the self.

Everything seemed out of my control as I controlled everything.  I began this life giving journey a controlling Co-dependent child in a Womans body & Mothers role with Adult responsibilities. Today, I face the challenges of raising me up to my purpose and potential utilizing the healing gifts of music and lyrics.  

This new collection of experiences through song are the first I can honestly say that Ive written without my once people-pleasing, doubts and fear of judgement.  A tough task for me in past as a shell.  Breaking the cycle of dysfunction, stepping out of the confines and legacy that Residential and Indian Boarding Schools left as healing scars on our hearts, not only takes courage but also the support, patience and understanding from those on the same road.  Much Respect to all our Teachers from humans to animals, from karma to destiny and from past to the future.   

With every lyric I write and every chord I play I keep my teachers and lessons in heart and mind.  I am at a place in my life where I feel its time to honor the people out there who are on their own road to self-discovery and recovery with this album.  As well as those who have been our strength when we barely had any...I share this creation and collection with you.

This is my very first campaign to raise funds to create my 3rd studio album of twelve (12) original songs composed throughout my awakening.  I invite any and all music lovers from all corners of the Earth to join me in the making of this gift to honor the warriors in us all and for those who have shared their light, knowledge and gifts with us.  These songs are my gift to acknowledge you all. 

 You can help by sharing the links to the campaign page on your social media sites, word of mouth, donate or just by sharing an inspirational message I may use and credit you for in the liner notes of this album. I appreciate your time and consideration in this musically healing endeavor...Here we go.   Lets Create...

EST. BUDGET STUDIO RECORDING COSTS $15,000 - (WHERE YOUR SUPPORT GOES)...

Pre-Productions Costs (song development/demos):                                                    $2500.00

Active Production Costs (Producer/Musicians/Engineer/Studio Time):               $9500.00

Post Creation (mixing/mastering):                                                                                       $1200.00

Graphics/Printing and Distribution:                                                                                     $2500.00

Marketing/Launch (start up):                                                                                                 $1000.00

TOTAL ESTIMATE:                                                                                                                   $16,700.00

MINUS: personal contributions to date                                                                      - 1700.00

TOTAL ESTIMATED BUDGET:                                                                              $15,000.00

story:
Hi, My name is Dave Manley, Guitarist/Composer/Producer/Educator.

A full time musician/writer/Educator, I have collaborated with major artists from the R&B, World, and Jazz genres in the United States, Canada, and Europe. I have toured and recorded with artists including:  Jill Scott, DJ Jazzy Jeff, Music Soul Child, Raheem Devaughn, Ana Nalick, Chiwoniso Maraire, Kindred The Family Soul Dave Chappelle, and more. I  co-wrote the song “Still Here” on Jill Scott’s Words and Sounds Vol. One, which is to be used in an upcoming motion picture. I was also featured in Jill Scott’s “Live In Paris” DVD and performed in Dave Chappelle's "Block Party" movie.

  • THE REASON I AM RAISING FUNDS
My goal is to raise $17,000 to finance the completion of a record that is currently in production. Why $17, 000 you ask? Well after much research into planning a record and tour,  spending many late nights on the internet researching everything from recording costs which include mixing, mastering, reproduction of CD's and other devices such as removable drives that mimic business cards that hold MP3's of the record.  I will also utilize the many business associates I have come to work with over the years. Professionals who will save me time and money in the process of finishing the record. The funds I raise through this Indiegogo campaign will help  finance the artwork for the CD covers/removable drives. It will also cover promotion for the record and tour, which is in the planning now.  I already have dates finalized in Philadelphia and New York City in April. See my Website: 

http://www.Davemanleymusic.com  

I plan tour a good portion of the United States and Canada, hitting mostly the major cities.  My group consists of 3 to 4 members depending on the engagement. Each person in my group is the consummate professional. 

  • THE PERKS I AM OFFERING

The PERKS that I am am offering for contributions of $200 are 2 one on one FaceTime lessons or at least an hour and a half at length. These lessons can also be in person for contributors in the New York and Philadelphia area for the shows we've already booked in in early April 2015. The lessons are to be arranged prior to the tour. Contributions of a $1000 get you a private concert in your home or venue to be arranged at a specific date. Contributions of a $1500 and above get a you a private concert and master class at a date to be arranged. 

  • MY QUALIFICATIONS TO EARN YOUR TRUST IN DONTATING TO MY CAMPAIGN

Having lived in the great music cities of Detroit, Los Angeles, Philadelphia, New York and now Austin Texas, I have managed to earn a living as a full time musician. I started and continue to maintain three great nights of music at two great Austin venues, Dozen Street and Strange Brew. These are themed nights that include the sounds of  Soul/HipHop/Jazz/ and Dance music. This is where I have built and continue to assemble my record concept.  When I lived in Philadelphia, I successfully ran a Jazz night  for 4 years at Vudu Lounge in West Chester PA, a very popular destination. as well as teaching at Eastern University were I taught Jazz Improvisation for 13 14 years.  I have produced my own records, including my debut record "Deep Pm' in 2000. I have toured under my own name, handing all the booking/travel and technical issues. The skills I have acquired over the past two decades has prepared me to lead my own band and conquer the world!!

  • PRUDENT SPENDING

There are always risks when booking a tour, as the saying goes, anything that can go wrong, will. The things I have already put into place already include a AAA Premium plan which helps in securing cheaper  hotel rates cheaper, airline tickets and other travel related costs. 

PRELIMINARY BREAK DOWN OF FUNDS DISPERSION .                    

FISCAL BREAK DOWN



  • IF I DONT REACH MY FISCAL GOAL

In the event I don't reach my goal of $17000, the funds I do raise will be used to help finance the 20 city promo tour that is already in the progress of being booked. The remainder of dates to be booked is contingent on how much I can raise through this Indiegogo fund raiser. 

I believe the music that I am writing and performing now to be the best I've ever produced. I'm taking 20 plus years as a sideman, playing with all the great artists  mentioned in my summary, and filtering it through my own unique voice.

Sincerely

Dave Manley

Davemanleymusic.com

story:
The Story

The Go-Go Symphony, a new music phenomenon in Washington DC, is a symphony you can dance and party to.  And young people love it!  Therefore, it is a great way to introduce them to the power of the symphony orchestra.

This new genre combines classical music with Washington DC's go-go dance beats that the youth already love.  The show has received rave reviews from critics, and standing ovations from sold out crowds. 

Many students have expressed interest in attending the next performance with the Capital City Symphony on March 21, 2015.   However, some cannot afford to buy tickets to the show.  Will you help them?  For the sake of classical and go-go music? 


What We Need & What You Get


We need to raise $20 to $500 to send up to 25 students to the Go-Go Symphony concert. If we get more, that's fine too.  But even just $20 can buy one ticket, which can make make a big difference for one student.  Or you can give $1, which can get us just a bit closer to helping that one student. 

Tickets will be distributed to DC area school teachers and students who have expressed interest in group field trips or individual attendance.  They will also be distributed through announcements on radio stations.
All contributions are tax deductible; as proceeds go to the 501(c)(3) non-profit Unified Empowerment Inc., which is sponsoring this effort as a music educational program.   How much tax is deducted depends on how you do your taxes. UEI is dedicated to training and employing our service veterans and people with disabilities. 

The Impact

Both classical and go-go music are struggling these days.  Classical music has audiences that are diminishing and aging.  It needs something new, like the Go-Go Symphony, to attract younger audiences.  Go-Go music has been popular in the Washington DC area since the 1970's; but is still an unknown genre to the rest of the world. 

Your contribution will help expose young people to new musical horizons; spread both classical and go-go music to the mainstream music scene; and perhaps create more jobs for musicians in the future.


Risks & Challenges

If we don't reach our $500 goal, we will still be able to buy tickets with whatever we receive.  We need at least $20 to buy one ticket for a student.   If we do not reach that minimum, we will give a student a discount equal to the amount that we receive.  A portion of your contribution will go to UEI for administrative fees.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute, there are other ways you can help:

    • Attend our next show March 21, 2015 at the Atlas in Washington DC
    • Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on facebook
    • Follow us on twitter
    • Share this fundraising campaign with your friends


    And that's all there is to it.

story:
Video con subtitulos en castellano: http://youtu.be/3l1BNRTY1Oo

Rise To Fall New Album is coming soon and we need your help to do our best!!!


Hi guys!!! Here Rise to Fall speaking!!!

We are a death melodic metal band that has been playing together  since 2006.

We have already internationally released two works; "Restore the Balance" (2010) and "Defying the Gods" (2012), and we are about to publish our third studio album, mixed and mastered at Hansen Studios (Denmark).

We have big plans for this new project, such as recording a video clip or touring around Europe, Japan and, why not, America. However, and as it is the case of many other bands, before any of this can happen, we need to face a very worrying setback: MONEY.

We have worked very hard and counted on the collaboration of awesome professionals for this third album and, as it is obvious, this all entails big expenses. That is why we are asking for your help!! 

The money we raise will be aimed at promoting the new album and merchandising it. It would also constitute a big boost to start touring.


What do we need?

$ 7,000 

We know that we are talking about an important amount of money but, as we mentioned above, that's what it takes to enroll reputed professionals and to obtain a high quality work. Below, you can find a list of the costs of our album:

  • Production & Recording ($ 6,000)
  • Mix and Master at Hansen Studios( $ 6,500)
  • Artwork ($ 1,100)
TOTAL: $ 13600

As you can see for yourselves, recording an album is quite expensive. Nonetheless, we want you to notice that the money we hope to raise will not be dedicated to recovering these expenses, but to continuing working on the project and making sure we give our fans the best of us. 

Here below, we show what we plan to do with the funds raised:


  • Live shows items (backdrop,roll ups...) ($ 1,000)
  • Music video ($ 2,000)
  • Tour expenses ($ 1,500) 
  • Merchandise ($ 1,000)
  • Perks ($ 1,000)
  • IndieGoGo Fees (4% - 9%) ($ 290)
  • Credit Card & Paypal Fees (3%) ($ 210)            
    •             
                      TOTAL: $ 7,000


    What do we offer our contributors in exchange?

    As we see it, fans are the reason for the existence of the band, and we would be very grateful to anyone who takes part in the crowdfunding. Thus, we have prepared awesome perks for our appreciated contributors!!! Some of them will be exclusive and limited!! So, don't miss the opportunity, help us  and be the first to get the new album and the exclusive merchandise!!



    Thank you very much for your support!!!


    Help us sharing this campaign (http://igg.me/at/risetofall)

     and Follow us on:

    Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/risetofallofficial)

    Youtube(https://www.youtube.com/user/risetofallband)

    Twitter(https://twitter.com/rise_to_fall_)

We are a death melodic metal band that has been playing together  since 2006.
We have already internationally released two works; "Restore the Balance" (2010) and "Defying the Gods" (2012), and we are about to publish our third studio album, mixed and mastered at Hansen Studios (Denmark).
We have big plans for this new project, such as recording a video clip or touring around Europe, Japan and, why not, America. However, and as it is the case of many other bands, before any of this can happen, we need to face a very worrying setback: MONEY.
We have worked very hard and counted on the collaboration of awesome professionals for this third album and, as it is obvious, this all entails big expenses. That is why we are asking for your help!! 
The money we raise will be aimed at promoting the new album and merchandising it. It would also constitute a big boost to start touring.

story:
Sounds For Your Space: The Harmonics for Your Home Project

Join us on our mission to create more harmony around the world! With ancient Feng Shui principles in mind, Grammy award winning producer/musician Jeff Bova and Feng Shui expert Carole J. Hyder have created Harmonize Your Home to balance and energize your home, your life and your planet. 

Your donation will be used to fund a focused marketing program that will raise awareness of this revolutionary sound treatment. By improving the energy in our environment, we can increase the peace and prosperity in our lives and the lives of others. Funds raised during this project will help advertise and promote the use of Harmonize Your Home around the world. Donate $25 or more and receive special gifts to harmonize your own space as well!

Imagine if everyone had a home or office with perfect energy. Imagine a world where simply stepping into your office can make you happy, or working in your kitchen gives you peace. Imagine a world where music can tame the environments where we live, work and play - and change our lives for the better. This is the purpose of Harmonize Your Home and the Harmonics for Your Home Project.

Harmonize Your Home is music to balance any space! By improving the energy in your environment, you increase the peace and prosperity in your life. Whether you're present or not, playing the Harmonize Your Home sound treatment can better your home or office environment by bringing in harmony and peaceful energy. 

We're raising funds to further Harmonize Your Home's reach.  Our vision of people everywhere using the power of Feng Shui and sound to bring tranquility into their homes and lives can become a reality. Help us increase awareness about the Harmonize Your Home project by donating today. Join Jeff and Carole and become part of a revolutionary movement to bring harmony to the world one home at a time.

How Harmonize Your Home Works

Feng Shui states for a space to be properly aligned - allowing maximum energy flow  - all five Chinese elements must be present. The presence can be a representative color or shape, or the element itself. Alignment and maximum energy can benefit your health, luck, fortune and beyond.  

Inspired by this concept, Jeff and Carole have created music that incorporates all five Chinese elements in harmonics that demonstrate vibrational patterns to attune the space for each element. Transitioning through Water, Wood, Fire, Earth and Metal, the benefits of this beautiful blend of music, science and East Asian philosophy can be experienced with no effort, making it a time-saving and pragmatic tool for those which to experience more harmony and a more peaceful environment.

You can leave Harmonize Your Home playing when you leave, and it will work its magic in your absence. This means after a day at the office, you'll return to a more balanced and energized home. Or when you get back to your office the next day, your workspace will be in synergy. Realtors can also use it to harmonize homes they're showing for sale!

About the Creators

Carole J. Hyder, MBA, WWM has accomplished international success as a Feng Shui consultant, speaker, teacher, and trainer. Her main teacher was His Holiness Professor Thomas Lin Yun who lived in Berkeley until his death in 2010; she maintains her studies with his successor Her Holiness Crystal Chu Rinpoche. Carole is the author of three books and two videos and has appeared monthly on the NBC affiliate station KARE 11 Showcase MN discussing the various aspects of Feng Shui. Carole is founder and President of the Wind and Water School of Feng Shui, a private career school licensed by the Minnesota Higher Education Services Office. Prior to her pursuit of Feng Shui, Carole was a classically trained pianist, working toward a major in music from St. Teresa’s in Winona, MN. Although her major eventually changed, her interest in music did not. By combining her passion for Feng Shui with her musical background, she added a unique perspective during the shaping of the Harmonics for Your Home project.

Jeff Bova is a Grammy Award winning record producer, arranger and composer from Los Angeles. In addition to his award winning work with Celine Dion, he has contributed to hundreds of recordings by significant mainstream artists like Katy Perry, Michael Jackson, Luther Vandross, The Back Street Boys, Eric Clapton, Joe Cocker, Cyndi Lauper, Meat Loaf, and more. Jeff’s experience with Feng Shui started in the 90’s when he hired a master to assess his recording studio in New York City for the purposes of enhancing the business. He saw firsthand the positive results that Feng Shui offered and became a solid supporter. The master was His Holiness Professor Thomas Lin Yun - Carole Hyder’s Feng Shui teacher.


See the Process

Carole and Jeff recently conducted a home visit to tailor sounds to the house's specific layout and create more balance in the home. These photos give a glimpse into the creative and spiritual process of harmonizing a home with music and Feng Shui.

Carole and Jeff explore the living space to get a feel for its unique qualities and energetic needs.

They consult blueprints and consider the specifics of the home's flow of energy.

Jeff gets to work composing music specifically for the space while the resident dog, Lucky, finds the music so relaxing he nods off at Jeff's feet!


Our Goal & Your Gifts

We will raise $10,000 to promote Harmonize Your Home to help balance our homes, our lives and our planet. Every living space can fall prey to things that disrupt balance - clutter, chaos or negative energy from a negative event. All spaces can use Harmonize Your Home and bring your environment back into alignment. We need your help to broaden the album's reach. Help us raise awareness for this amazing development in Feng Shui practice. More people can improve their lives by improving the energy in their space, but not without your help! 

In exchange for your support, we're offering the following perks: 

  • For a pledge of $25, you'll receive a copy of Harmonize Your Home personally autographed by Carole Hyder and Jeff Bova. CDs are estimated to ship in September 2015.
  • For a pledge of $50, you'll receive an autographed Harmonize Your Home CD and Carole's book Living Feng Shui. Estimated to ship in September 2015.
  • For a pledge of $100, you'll receive an autographed Harmonize Your Home CD, Carole's book Living Feng Shui, and a free download of new music from Carole and Jeff. Estimated to ship in September 2015.
  • For a pledge of $250, you'll receive a 30-minute Feng Shui consultation with Carole via Skype. Contact us through this page re: timing for fulfillment.
  • For a pledge of $500, you'll receive a one hour consultation with Carole in Minneapolis or with Jeff in Los Angeles. Contact us through this page re: timing for fulfillment.
  • For a pledge of $3,000, you'll receive a total Harmonize Your Home consultation with both Jeff and Carole. They will evaluate your home from a Feng Shui perspective and Jeff will compose original music to suit your space. Contact us through this page re: timing for fulfillment.

In the event that we don't reach our $10,000 goal (but we're setting the positive intention that we will!), the funds raised will still be used to promote Harmonize Your Home to bring the benefits of Feng Shui sound treatments to a wider audience.

Why $10,000, and How Will We 'Promote'?

In order to reach a global audience with Harmonize Your Home we need to extensively promote the album, with the eventual goal of not only raising awareness but making the music available for purchase in online and brick and mortar retailers across the world. 

We have already secured the services of a highly experienced integrated marketing communications firm in the Twin Cities area, local to Carole and her business. Integrated marketing communications combines things like public relations (media outreach), social media and blogging to get the word out about a product. The funds we raise through this campaign will help us fund work with our marketing experts.

When we say we're going to use money from this campaign to promote Harmonize Your Home, what we mean is:

  • Our public relations representatives will mount multiple, global campaigns to get the attention of media around the world. Since the media hugely influences public awareness and opinion, getting the word out through online, print and broadcast media is essential. This includes securing interviews for Carole and Jeff, getting the album reviewed and into gift guides, attracting feature stories about the album and more.
  • Our social media team will step up efforts to grow our global audience on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more. Followers will be kept updated about Harmonize Your Home and other projects, and can easily share our content with their friends and family, which spreads the word.
  • Our marketers will create content (written and video - like the above video about the Harmonize Your Home process) to help people understand what this album is all about and how it works. This will be distributed worldwide.
  • We'll use advertising in various forms, especially digital, to help us get attention for Harmonize Your Home.
  • Additionally, with the help of our marketers, we will constantly think of new and innovative ways to introduce Harmonize Your Home to the world.


Your Pledge Will Make a Difference

Harmonize Your Home has the potential to change your life - and to change the world. With the perks you'll receive for pledging to help us with this project, you can completely alter your home or work environment in a way that has real impact on your life. And with the funds you pledge to us, we will work hard to make that a possibility for people all around the world. What could happen if the whole world was in harmony?

Both Carole and Jeff have proven success in their industries, and with the Harmonics for Your Home project. Their second Feng Shui music album, The Bridge, is also a sound treatment for your space. Its specific intent was to ease transition, such as transition of life in a hospice or palliative care space. It is also applicable to any transition in the listener's life. So by joining the Harmonics for Your Home project, you'll be part of an ongoing collaboration that already has a firm foundation.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute a monetary pledge, you can still help us further the Harmonics for Your Home project. Please spread the word about the Harmonize Your Home campaign. Indiegogo has convenient tools on this page for sharing this campaign. We encourage you to join us in sharing the news - often! 

Thank you for your help. Together, we can bring harmony to every home.

What People Are Saying About Harmonize Your Home

“Wonderful CD, the house loves it, as well as my office!” – Hannie R.

“I could listen to it all the time.” – Kelly C.

“This music is incredibly inspiring.” –Lisa J.

“I HIGHLY recommend Harmonize Your Home for anyone who wants to make a GIANT shift in their life!” – Carol C.

“The tracks are absolutely brilliant, really encapsulating the elements” – AL, UK

story:
Join Us As We Film the Highs and Lows of Our World Electric Bicycle Long Distance Record Journey

Husband and Wife team aim to set a new World Record for all Baby Boomers

Want to know an interesting fact? Excluding non-copyright works such as the Bible and the Koran, the world’s all-time best-selling book isGuinness World Records, formerly known as The Guinness Book of Records.

Why? Because clearly with sales exceeding 100 million copies since 1955, there are untold millions of people worldwide – including my wife and I - who have dreamed of one day becoming world record holders.

But that is what makes us different to the vast majority of people. Far from being just “dreamers", we are “doers” who have conceived an ambitious plan to set a new World Long Distance Electric Bike Record on the EuroVelo European cycle route network in 2015/16. The record attempt will be videoed throughout, with the resultant film and book to be showcased at cycling trade shows, seminars and through other yet-to-be-determined outlets.

So who are we, you are entitled to ask? We are Gary and Rachel Corbett, two ordinary Australians aged 60 and 56 respectively, who not only want to set the above record for our own satisfaction, but for all of the Baby Boomer generation. These days it seems all you ever hear about are the achievements of Generations X and Y, but long before aforesaid Xs and Ys came along, it was the Baby Boomers who were trailblazing the world. And so it will be again – at least in the electric bike world - when we eventually officially lay claim to the coveted world record for the longest journey ever officially recorded on an electric bicycle.

It won’t be an easy challenge given the time, distance, cost and logistics involved but we know the end result will be more than worth the effort for  a host of reasons.

For full details of our record attempt go to our website at www. ebikecycletourists.com

Our Backgrounds

Gary Corbett is an award-winning Australian journalist who since retiring from a career spanning 30-plus years working as a newspaper journalist, now concentrates on writing about all aspects of the organised cycle tour industry. Over the past 10 years Gary has cycled well in excess of 30,000 kilometres completing guided, self-guided, bike and barge and long distance solo tours in Europe, Australia, Asia and South America.

Rachel, Gary’s wife and cycling buddy, is equally obsessed about cycle touring. A primary/middle school teacher and the IT expert of the family, she has always had a passion for travelling and learning about new cultures and languages. In fact it is never difficult to persuade Rachel to go on another travel adventure if it involves exploring yet another foreign country – especially if it is on a bicycle.

Where Will the Record Attempt be Held

Starting from London in late April 2015, the e-bike record attempt will be held mainly on the EuroVelo European cycle route network which consists of 14 transcontinental cycling routes stretching from the Atlantic to the Black Sea and the Arctic to the Mediterranean.  


Our Campaign – Why We Need YOU

The bottom line is pretty simple really, what we are planning is hugely expensive! That is why we would like to think that the entire Baby Boomer generation – and also compassionate Xs and Ys out there – will get behind us so we can show the world that it is even possible for a couple on the “wrong side of their mid-50s” to become world record holders.

To successfully set a new world record will be a defining achievement for both of us. To put it simply we are putting everything we have into the record attempt in terms of time, money and commitment, and are hopeful that the Indiegogo community will recognise our dedication to achieving our dream by helping out financially. The resultant film will, in a small way, be a tangible record of your financial assistance.

How the Funds Will be Used

All of the money raised through Indiegogo will go directly to purchasing much needed computer, video and camera equipment and all of the other gear needed to make the record breaking ride a reality such as lightweight tents, camping equipment, biking specific equipment, insurances etc, etc, etc … the list just goes on and on!

Risks & Challenges

There are risks and challenges associated with anything you do in life. But when it involves up to 12 months of cycling in all sorts of climatic conditions across all sorts of terrain in addition to the daily necessity to find places to camp, charge the e-bike batteries and the other 1001 things that have to be dealt with logistically on a self-contained fully loaded extended cycle tour, there is plenty that can and at times WILL go wrong. All of these moments and more will be the subject of the video we will be shooting.

But while we clearly acknowledge the risks and challenges to be faced are very real, it is important to clarify one very important fact ... we are far from elite athletes. To put it simply we are just two people who love cycling - and cycling together. Like anyone our age we have our fair share of niggling medical issues, have dodgy knees and are always on the lookout for a good chiropractor to keep our joints working as they should. But given all of the above, we are supremely confident of being able to methodically chip away at the kilometres to eventually lay claim to completing the longest ever electric bike journey undertaken.

Other Ways You Can Help

If, for whatever reason, you are unable to help with a cash donation, we totally understand – but that far from makes you less important to us. The biggest help you can give us is to alert anyone and everyone who may have an interest in what we are attempting to achieve. As such can you please make some noise in your social media circles and use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word. Any help at all will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your support

Gary and Rachel Corbett

ebikecycletourists.com
Our
Backgrounds
Gary
Corbett is an award-winning Australian journalist who since retiring from a
career spanning 30-plus years working as a newspaper journalist, now
concentrates on writing about all aspects of the organised cycle tour industry.
Over the past 10 years Gary has cycled well in excess of 30,000 kilometres
completing guided, self-guided, bike and barge and long distance solo tours in
Europe, Australia, Asia and South America.Rachel,
Gary’s wife and cycling buddy, is equally obsessed about cycle touring. A
primary/middle school teacher and the IT expert of the family, she has always
had a passion for travelling and learning about new cultures and languages. In
fact it is never difficult to persuade Rachel to go on another travel adventure
if it involves exploring yet another foreign country – especially if it is on a
bicycle. 
Where
Will the Record Attempt be Held
Starting from London in late April 2015, the e-bike
record attempt will be held mainly on the EuroVelo
European cycle route network which consists of 14 transcontinental cycling routes
stretching from the Atlantic to the Black Sea and the Arctic to the
Mediterranean.  
Our
Campaign – Why We Need YOU
The bottom line is pretty simple really, what we are planning is hugely
expensive! That is why we would like to think that the entire Baby Boomer
generation – and also compassionate Xs and Ys out there – will get behind us so
we can show the world that it is even possible for a couple on the
“wrong side of their mid-50s” to become world record holders.
To successfully set a new world record will be a defining achievement for
both of us. To put it simply we are putting everything we have into the record
attempt in terms of time, money and commitment, and are hopeful that the
Indiegogo community will recognise our dedication to achieving our dream by
helping out financially. The resultant film will, in a small way, be a tangible
record of your financial assistance.
How the Funds Will be
Used
All of the money raised through Indiegogo will go directly to purchasing much
needed computer, video and camera equipment and all of the other gear needed to make the
record breaking ride a reality such as lightweight tents, camping equipment, biking
specific equipment, insurances etc, etc, etc … the list just goes on and on! 
Risks &
Challenges
There
are risks and challenges associated with anything you do in life. But when it
involves up to 12 months of cycling in all sorts of climatic conditions across
all sorts of terrain in addition to the daily necessity to find places
to camp, charge the e-bike batteries and the other 1001 things that have to be
dealt with logistically on a self-contained fully loaded extended cycle tour, there is plenty that can and at times WILL
go wrong. All of these moments and more will be the subject of the video we will
be shooting.
But
while we clearly acknowledge the risks and challenges to be faced are very
real, it is important to clarify one very important fact ... we are far from elite
athletes. To put it simply we are just two people who love cycling - and cycling
together. Like anyone our age we have our fair share of niggling medical
issues, have dodgy knees and are always on the lookout for a good chiropractor
to keep our joints working as they should. But given all of the above, we are
supremely confident of being able to methodically chip away at the kilometres
to eventually lay claim to completing the longest ever electric bike journey
undertaken.
Other Ways You
Can Help
If, for whatever reason, you are unable to help with a cash donation, we
totally understand – but that far from makes you less important to us. The
biggest help you can give us is to alert anyone and everyone who may have an
interest in what we are attempting to achieve. As such can you please make some
noise in your social media circles and use the Indiegogo share tools to
spread the word. Any help at all will be greatly appreciated.
Thank you for your support
Gary and Rachel Corbett

story:
We want you to embrace WITH Love 2015 UK

WITH Love 2015 UK is a music-led pre-election campaign to raise awareness about the anti-immigration rhetoric in the UK & the media. Its centrepiece is a song called:

'Why Is This Happening' 

(aka WITH)

  • It’s our love song to the UK.
  • It's our plea to everyone not to believe the divisive rhetoric.
  • It’s our call to action.


Why the WITH Love 2015 UK campaign matters

We wrote Why Is This Happening because we are very concerned about how the current debate about immigration has led to a lack of serious and informed dialogue on the subject. Migration plays a hugely positive role in the UK workforce, contributing more to the treasury than is paid out, but instead what we’re hearing is scaremongering rhetoric from politicians and the media based on untruths. Immigrants have become easy scapegoats for a raft of domestic problems – housing shortages, unemployment, low wages, crowded schools and hospitals, and even congested roads! 

         

       

This disconnect between perception and reality needs to be addressed. We want to stop the divisive rhetoric, and that's where you come in. 

With your funding and support, together let's make some noise with our song! Please join us on WITH Love 2015 UK campaign.

Here is our teaser....


The Song

Sung by Pola Pospieszalska from Poland – because too often all we hear are the voices of politicians and pundits, the song has been written and composed by song writer Alan D. Boyd.




How you can help

With your funding, we’ll record the single and create the music video. We’ll release and market the single in the run up to the general election. We’ll take it on the campaign trail. And we’ll get it to the top of the charts!

In order to do this we need to raise a minimum of £15,000, which breaks down as follows:


Song master recording:   £4,000

We've cut our demo but now we need to get a master. Alan will be working with the sound engineer Marco Martini (Mumford & Sons, Ed Sheeran, George Michael) to record and mix the single, using musicians from around the world. One of the perks is a chance to come into the studio and see the process as well as playing percussion on the track.

Music video production:  £5,000

Our plan is to shoot a tongue-in-cheek video over two days in March in which Pola will feature as a waitress in a greasy spoon café. For the chorus, she'll break into a dream sequence with all the café patrons joining in a musical song and dance routine. It'll be fun, cheeky and poignant. Come and join us for filming of the dream sequence!

Music PR:  £6,000

In order to get the song on the radio and into the charts – with the aim of becoming Number One! – it'll be necessary to engage an experienced music PR specialist.


The Perks

We have prepared some exciting perks for you:

Would you like to own the song before anybody else? 
You’ll be able to download the MP3.

Would you like to take part in the master recording?
You’ll be granted access to the recording studio.

Would you like to appear in our music video singing and dancing alongside Pola?
You’ll be invited to take part in the shoot.

And now the one and only: THE STRUDEL PERK!


Would you like to know how to make the most delicious Czech apple strudel?Lucie will reveal the secret recipe passed down from generation to generation in a clandestine manner  – it survived the Habsburgs and eluded the Nazis and the communists! (Note: your knowledge of Czech history for the past 500 years will not be required in order to claim this perk.)

COME AND JOIN US!

LET’S MAKE SOME NOISE WITH THIS SONG!

story:
What Is D.O.P.E. Fest?

(D)on't (O)ppress (P)eople (E)ver Music Festival has already shown through mass public interest that it will serve as an elevating & creative experience addressing social issues relating to the common good.

This is an opportunity to bring to question the liberties and freedoms America was built upon. 2015 is here and we have a fresh start and the opportunity to tell our representatives and leaders we want access to all options for care. By exercising our rights to educating, registering people to become voting constituents, and signing petitions to take direct actions to return the power to the people! With this festival, we will cultivate awareness of the benefits of medical marijuana and the lives that could be saved every day. While legislators and law enforcement focus on penalizing users of medicinal marijuana, actual criminals go free and tax dollars wasted. Crime by definitions is an action or omission that constitutes an offense. Is restriction from the pursuit of happiness and peaceful living considered a crime too?

Hopefully, as a byproduct of states legalizing medicinal marijuana, petitions formed by Constituents of the United States, and sheer overwhelming support from YOU the federal government can acknowledge that marijuana does have medicinal uses!

The Festival

D.O.P.E. Fest will take place 4/18/2015 at a premiere venue in Washington DC. We will have a Pre-game before the main event; Imagine a massive gathering of fun-loving, music enthusiast, coming together for a good cause. A life elevating experience captivated by delicious food, a mixture of drinks, selfie action (photo booths) and video games! While all this is going on many are being schooled on more than the sneakers and gear that are simultaneously being sold or exchanged. Information booths regarding medical marijuana, health, voter registration sheets and petitions will be available. Finally, a live DJ battle will end the pre-game and commence the main event.

The art of the DJ has transformed over generations of new technology, techniques, and great music. We are restoring the raw art of the DJ with a head to head multilevel battle featuring two legendary/popular DJs facing off before the headliners take stage. This will be a fun and very entertaining portion of DOPE Fest! We will promote the DJ battle as a special entity of DOPE Fest to help increase awareness of the event itself.

Live performances by famous artists will fill the main event, with short speeches from influential activists and political figureheads intermittently peppered throughout. We plan on releasing the artists as the event comes closer and also so we can determine who YOU want to see! 



What We WANT:

-To Throw a DOPE Festival in Washington DC to  capture an audience to educate on the effects and promote actions to create greater access of medicinal marijuana

-Marijuana to be rescheduled to Class III, IV or V under Title 21 of The United States Controlled Substance Act 

-More access for pharmaceutical research of Marijuana in the United States

-To Create "The Rosalind Fund" to promote research and access for medicinal marijuana.


Who Is Rosalind?

Rosalind I. Jacobs MSE. was an entrepreneur, scholar, and mother of two children whom she loved. She worked as a Guidance Counselor and acting Assistant Principal in the Buffalo Public School System during the school year, while working per diem as a Substance Abuse Counselor during the summer. She was known for her hard work and success she received as a Business Owner of Rosalind's Records. Not to mention her astounding work as a school counselor leaving impressions which will last for a lifetime on her students, and raising two children.

After being treated with chemotherapy for pancreatic cancer, a rare liver disease that was recessive became active due to the effects of treatment. We wonder if things would have been different if she had access to medicinal marijuana as an alternative? Would she still be here counseling students and seeing her grandchildren grow up? All we can do is wonder, but we can not change the past. But with your help we can do something about the future! With better access to patients, physicians and researchers we may be able to find that cure! 

We are memorializing Will’s mother by starting a cancer research fund that supports doctors, scientists, and physicians in developing nonintrusive treatments for cancer patients; and other general medicinal marijuana uses. We have found concrete evidence that cannabis is an alternative to chemotherapy and want to ensure the American people are educated about all of the life saving options.

It is our social responsibility to speak up! If not us, then who?


The People's Champ

The People's Champ (TPC) is a startup company, focused on creating innovative and interactive experiences for college students, young professionals, influential people and future leaders to network and facilitate social change. We are creating a local impact in New York and Washington D.C. and there are currently 8 people on staff. Patrice Laquinte, a graduate of The George Washington University serves as our CEO with both Howard University Alumni, Will Thomas and Todd Hughes serving as our CAO and Director of Operations, respectively. Our legal counsel is provided by Brandon L. Wyatt Esq.


Current Sponsors:
"Justice From A to Zaus"-  We have teamed up with Justice from A to Zaus, a non-profit which serves others with integrity, loyalty, compassion and valor as a conduit of reflection of CEO's Delzora Wall son, 'Zaus'. This is a Festival for awareness to dissemble the grip-hold the pharmaceutical system has on the current market and to teach people that there are other natural alternatives to modern chemical medicines. From the effects of Cancer and the inability of the commonplace western methods to treat these certain disease, countless people die from a lack of knowledge and access. 

How You Can Help!

A movement is nothing when it is just one, but united we can ensure all of our names will go down in the annals of history to become the generation who gathered together to shape the world as we knew it.

Donations will go a long way to ensure this event will happen, but sharing a meme from www.instagram.com/dope_fest on your Social Media (Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Pintrest, Google+, Snap-Chat, etc) will go a long way in helping spread the awareness necessary to properly educate on the issue at hand.

Sharing will be the crux this event will live and die on, and if you can help by spreading media, tagging #DOPEFest and #DontOppressPeopleEver, we will create a wave that will ride through the tides of time.

Thank You! This Movement would be nothing without you!

Preliminary Costs:

• Venue Deposit

• Artists Retainer

• Permits, Legal Counsel, Misc

• Marketing: Feb & March Promotional Event, Youtube, Google, Twitter, & FB Ads, College Newspapers, T-Shirts & Sweaters, E-mail & Text Message Marketing, + Street Teams

Rewards

Family Tree: You will be commemorated on our website as an advocate to show politicians that you support the movement

Hookah Pen: Exclusive design for multiple uses.

D.O.P.E. Fest Dreamers T-Shirt: Exclusive Designed T-Shirt only Available To YOU! #StayDOPE

D.O.P.E. Fest T-Shirt: Exclusive shirt with our signature logo and asterisk signify that you support the movement

VIP Level 1: All access, open bar, meet and greet with celebrities in VIP tents for you and 3 of your friends

VIP Level 2: Limited access to VIP tents, lounges, and priority seating for you and two (2) of your friends

+ Gift Package: Items that will be memorabilia, with exclusive signed gear and other cool surprises!!

**All Interested Unsigned Hypes/Artists We Apologize If You Haven't Been Contacted, but Please Contact Us At Info@Dope-Fest.com And We Will Make Sure You Are Included in The Movement!**

Risks and challenges

The risks and challenges that are associated with taking an event under your helm are numerous, but with these finances secured it will enable artist retainers, venue deposits, early marketing implementation, legal counsel, and stipends to keep the staff motivated. The remaining risks lie in the motivation and will power to maintain a very close and intimate relationship with all the inter-workings of this event, but due to the high emotional nature of this movement, with real messages, with real ability to change and save lives, we believe whole heartedly that we will succeed with this event and many more to come!
